scene.name: Dinosaur toy play setup
scene.description: A desk with a plastic dinosaur toy figurine

task.name: Play with dinosaur toy
task.description: Engage in imaginative play by manipulating the dinosaur toy on the table
task.spoken_prompt: Task: Let's play with the dinosaur. Please pick it up and move it around as if it's walking.
task.spoken_prompt_cn: 任务描述：让我们来玩恐龙玩具。请把它拿起，并像走路一样来回移动它。

subtasks.spoken_prompt: Subtask: Start playing with the dinosaur.
subtasks.spoken_prompt_cn: 子任务描述：开始玩恐龙玩具。

steps.description: Start playing with the dinosaur toy by moving it on the desk
steps.spoken_prompt: Step one: start playing with the dinosaur.

constraints.notes: Simulate walking or roaring movements; ensure the toy remains within the designated desk area.
